description: When running a program that uses a Metaclass, an AssertionError is thrown, indicating that the Metaclass is not configured correctly. The program fails to execute as the Metaclass is not properly configured to handle the data type that is being processed.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 2, in <module>
    assert isinstance(data
SyntaxError: unexpected EOF while parsing
